channel.title: Whats with 317?
channel.description:
In my opinion, the 317 server base is a mess. Here is my reasoning:
1. They use a main server class which initializes a lot of other classes into a variable, when they are static and do not need a variable.
2. Most classes do not have the appropriate names such as misc, potions, Item and ItemHandler (they completely throw off logic of the name if you look at the contents).
3. Some of the contents in the class files do not meet the name.
4. Player is abstract to client, which is deadly useless.
5. All of the contents is in one folder, instead of packages.
If you have other reasons please post your reasoning here, and PLEASE if you do not know how the 317 server works, leave this topic.

item.title: Whats with 317?
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:24, topic:362827”][quote author=oniscape link=topic=459104.msg3359900#msg3359900 date=1286248784]

I’m redoing Delta at the moment in my own way.

If users continue on with WinterLove and do not explore beyond the boundaries, which most do, they will not understand anything.

P.S. What was the source for your server? Looks like TestScape or one of them, but meh I haven’t explored too much into sources so I can’t really tell.

Don’t waste your time.

It would contribute to 317 development.

I mean, if people come to this website to learn java and they choose WinterLove, it will just make them not understand anything.

Plus, only a small few have redone the 317 source. Lin wanted to make it out of another source, which looked oddly like testscape, and quit.
[/quote]Your last line is extremely false. Your second line however, is also false. I came to this site to learn and chose CheezScape and TestScape, and look at how far I’ve gone.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Whats with 317?
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Actually 474s have done a good job so far. So I wouldn’t say up to 508 is shit

I’m redoing Delta at the moment in my own way. So yeah thought i’d post this topic.

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:12, topic:362827”]You know what’s wrong?

public void do(){      char[] c = {'c', 'o','e', 'l', 'h', 'o', ' ', 'o', 'w', 'n', 's'};      for(char i : c) log(i);}public synchronized void log(Object log){ System.out.println(log);}

shitmesses like that.[/quote]

One. If you put the enters back like I put, it would make more sense.
Two. MoparScape only allows 5 lines as signature, therefore I had to cut it down. Cutting it down like that was most reasonable.
Three. Synchronized is used when nothing else can use the method, therefore nothing else owns.
Four. The code works if you execute it correctly, which I did not have enough room for.

Please stay on topic, thanks.

Read full topic

@oniscape wrote:

In my opinion, the 317 server base is a mess. Here is my reasoning:

  1. They use a main server class which initializes a lot of other classes into a variable, when they are static and do not need a variable.

If you have other reasons please post your reasoning here, and PLEASE if you do not know how the 317 server works, leave this topic.
